fields.name: Abaddon
fields.description_short: Shields his allies or himself from attacks
fields.description_long: Able to transform enemy attacks into self-healing, Abaddon can survive almost any assault. Shielding allies and launching his double-edged coil at a friend or foe, he is always ready to ride into the thick of battle.

fields.name: Axe
fields.description_short: Taunts and forces enemies to attack him
fields.description_long: One after another, Axe cuts down his foes. Marching ahead of his team, he locks his enemies in battle then counters their blows with a deadly spin of his weapon. Slamming his culling blade through a weakened enemy, he is always charging onward.
fields.talent_left_10: +12% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger
fields.talent_left_20: +1 Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

fields.name: Arc Warden
fields.description_short: Creates a copy of himself to split push
fields.description_long: A splintered fragment of the same primordial power as the Ancients themselves, Zet the Arc Warden has pledged to see the clash between Radiant and Dire finally end. Assault lone enemies with fluxing energy, or distort space to generate a protective field around allies. Summon a Spark Wraith to patrol an area for enemies to infuse with harmful magic, then create a double of Zet, items and all, to overwhelm your foes.
fields.talent_left_15: +40 Magnetic Field Attack Speed/Bonus Magic Damage
fields.talent_right_25: No Damage Penalty Distance For Tempest Double

fields.name: Bane
fields.description_short: Puts his enemies to sleep, incapacitating them
fields.description_long: Bane brings terror to his enemies with his arsenal of disabling abilities. Whether trapping a foe within a contagious nightmare, or gripping an enemy in place, he gives allies all the time they need to slay their enemy.

fields.name: Batrider
fields.description_short: Can lasso an enemy away from his team
fields.description_long: Once he takes to the skies, Batrider can strike from any direction. Snatching a foe with his lasso, he soars above the treetops, pulling his prey through a trail of flame as he drags them before his merciless allies.

fields.name: Anti-Mage
fields.description_short: Slashes his foes with mana-draining attacks
fields.description_long: Should Anti-Mage have the opportunity to gather his full strength, few can stop his assaults. Draining mana from enemies with every strike or teleporting short distances to escape an ambush, cornering him is a challenge for any foe.

fields.name: Ancient Apparition
fields.description_short: Launches a powerful icy blast from anywhere on the map
fields.description_long: Able to launch a powerful blast of damaging ice across the battlefield, Ancient Apparition threatens to shatter weakened enemies wherever they are. Slowing enemies as he enhances his allies' effectiveness in battle, he is a constant threat to his foes.

fields.name: Alchemist
fields.description_short: Earns extra gold from unit kills and bounty runes
fields.description_long: Synthesizing extra resources from each and every kill, Alchemist has no trouble gathering the tools needed to destroy his foes. Ambushing enemies with corrosive acid and a host of unstable chemicals, he battles to ensure his greedy escapades can remain uninterrupted.
fields.talent_right_15: Acid Spray grants armor to allies

fields.name: Bloodseeker
fields.description_short: Chases down low health enemies with increased speed
fields.description_long: Bloodseeker forces difficult decisions on his enemies. Able to drive his foes to a retreat by bathing a large area with a damaging ritual, his gruesome ultimate asks his opponents to hold still, or die.

fields.name: Bristleback
fields.description_short: Takes reduced damage when facing away from enemies
fields.description_long: When it comes to a fight, Bristleback really puts his back into it. Reducing all damage arriving from the rear or from the sides, he wades into battle with barely a care, spraying enemies with damaging quills and slowing snot.

fields.name: Chaos Knight
fields.description_short: Has strong but random damage output
fields.description_long: Chaos Knight is an army unto himself. Able to summon a cavalry of clones to demolish enemy defenses, should an enemy present itself, he can rift reality to pull him and his phantasms close enough to rain brutal cudgel blows upon their head.

fields.name: Broodmother
fields.description_short: Hunts with her army of spiderlings
fields.description_long: Gliding along her webs, Broodmother births an army of spiders to lead her team's forces toward the enemy base. As prey wanders near, she joins her children and attacks, slowing foes with incapacitating bites as she indulges her insatiable hunger.

fields.name: Beastmaster
fields.description_short: Summons beasts to aid his hunt
fields.description_long: Summoning a poison-spitting boar and a scouting hawk to aid his hunt, Beastmaster never stalks the battlefield unprepared. Chopping through the forest with his axes, his stunning roar opens the way for his allies to devastate enemies.
fields.talent_left_10: +2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack
fields.talent_right_15: +20 Movespeed Aura to Beastmaster and his units
fields.talent_left_20: +250 Max Health Aura to Beastmaster and his units

fields.name: Brewmaster
fields.description_short: Splits into three elemental spirits with unique abilities
fields.description_long: A fearsome fighter in any situation, Brewmaster can turn the tide of battle by splitting into three elemental spirits, each with their own unique abilities. When not divided, he brings drunken chaos to his foes with slowing claps and powerful swings of his staff.
fields.talent_left_15: +1x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler
fields.talent_left_25: Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited

fields.name: Bounty Hunter
fields.description_short: Loots and collects bounties off of his enemies
fields.description_long: Sneaking invisibly at the heels of his enemies, Bounty Hunter is always keeping track of his foes. Whenever one of his targets falls in battle, he and his allies stand to make quite a profit.
fields.talent_left_15: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

fields.name: Centaur Warrunner
fields.description_short: Reflects damage back to his attackers
fields.description_long: Centaur Warrunner is a master of both inflicting and absorbing damage. Leading the charge into battle, he stomps to stun his enemies, and instantly counters their every attack. His stampede speeds his allies in both fight and flight, quickening the pace of the carnage.

fields.name: Clinkz
fields.description_short: Stalks invisibly to ambush lone enemies
fields.description_long: When Clinkz stalks invisibly through the battlefield, none are safe from ambush. Swift of foot and arrow, he rains fiery death upon his foes, calling upon an army of blazing compatriots to bolster his assault.

fields.name: Chen
fields.description_short: Converts creeps to his cause, building an army
fields.description_long: Converting the creatures of the forest to his cause, Chen leads his makeshift armies to aid his team in battle. He assaults enemies with beasts while sending friends to safety. Then, when things seem darkest, he heals his allies wherever they may be.
fields.talent_left_25: +200/+10 Hand of God Heal/Heal Over Time
fields.talent_right_25: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

fields.name: Clockwerk
fields.description_short: Launches himself into enemies with his hookshot
fields.description_long: Launching himself into enemies with his grappling hookshot, Clockwerk isolates targets and blasts them apart with disorienting shrapnel. As he scouts the battlefield with his handy flares, he never has trouble finding targets to send himself toward.

fields.name: Crystal Maiden
fields.description_short: Unleashes a high damage blizzard upon her foes
fields.description_long: Able to keep her allies supplied with mana as she slows down enemies to ensure a kill, Crystal Maiden is a helpful addition to any team. And, when the opportunity arises, she can unleash her massive ultimate ability to devastate her foes.

fields.name: Dark Seer
fields.description_short: Pulls and manipulates his enemies' positions
fields.description_long: Versatile and strategic, Dark Seer excels at manipulating the positions of his enemies. Vacuuming foes into the attacks of his allies, he can turn enemy strength against itself by pulling foes through his replicating wall.

fields.name: Dark Willow
fields.description_short: Has an arsenal of disables at her disposal
fields.description_long: A slight flutter from the shadows may be all an enemy sees of Dark Willow, as she eludes pursuit and controls her foe's movements with cunning fae tricks. Calling upon powers far more ancient than any scholarly magic, she binds enemies in place before unleashing the full wrath and terror of the fae realm upon them.

fields.name: Dawnbreaker
fields.description_short: Leaps to aid her allies, wherever they are on the map
fields.description_long: Dawnbreaker shines in the heart of battle, happily crushing enemies with her celestial hammer and healing nearby allies. She revels in hurling her hammer through multiple foes and then converging with it in a blazing wake, always waiting to tap her true cosmic power to fly to the aid of her teammates Ч eager to rout her enemies on the battlefield no matter where they are.

fields.name: Dazzle
fields.description_short: Powerful healer who can briefly prevent death
fields.description_long: Born to support his cohorts in battle, Dazzle keeps wounded allies alive so they might later rain death upon the enemy. His strange magic weaves its way into nearby armor, weakening enemies and strengthening friends.

fields.name: Death Prophet
fields.description_short: Summons an army of ghosts to attack
fields.description_long: When she unleashes her army of ghosts, Death Prophet excels at demolishing enemies and their defenses alike. Leading her team's forces toward the enemy base with wave after damaging wave from her swarm, her onslaught can seem unstoppable.

fields.name: Disruptor
fields.description_short: Traps and silences foes in his static storm
fields.description_long: Disruptor excels at shattering the plans of his enemies. Summoning impassable fences to trap targets as he calls down a silencing storm, should a foe attempt something unexpected he simply teleports them back to their earlier location.

fields.name: Doom
fields.description_short: Can prevent a single enemy from using abilties and items
fields.description_long: One way or another, Doom shuts down his enemies. Devouring creeps to claim the various skills they had in life, he can place a lingering silence upon a foe's spells and items with his ultimate as he torches his foes.

fields.name: Drow Ranger
fields.description_short: Slows with her frost-tipped arrows
fields.description_long: Not many can escape Drow Ranger once she's within range. After her foes have been silenced with a chilling blast, she finishes them off with a barrage of slowing, ice-tipped arrows that few can survive.

fields.name: Dragon Knight
fields.description_short: Transforms into a formidable ranged dragon
fields.description_long: When he takes on his terrifying dragon form, Dragon Knight strikes fear into any who face him. Strong and adaptable, he can stun his enemies and burn all in front of him, often providing his allies the momentum they need to carry them to victory.
fields.talent_left_20: +75% Breathe Fire Damage/Cast Range in Dragon Form
fields.talent_left_25: +400 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form

fields.name: Earth Spirit
fields.description_short: Disables and repositions his enemies
fields.description_long: Earth Spirit keeps the enemy in chaos and his friends in the fight. Adapting to any battle scenario, he can send his statue remnants back and forth to damage foes, or grips an ally from the jaws of death.

fields.name: Elder Titan
fields.description_short: Damages and disables with his astral spirit
fields.description_long: Scouting the way with his astral spirit, Elder Titan can strike from any direction. Halting foes with a stomp of his hoof while his presence eats away at their defenses, he splits the earth itself to bring his enemies low.
fields.talent_right_10: +2% Astral Spirit Move Speed Per Hero

fields.name: Earthshaker
fields.description_short: Disrupts enemy team with his chain stuns
fields.description_long: Whether blocking an enemy's escape, dividing their forces, or shattering the ground beneath gathered foes, Earthshaker is at his best when he strikes without warning. Whatever survives the aftershocks still has a swing from his mighty totem to look forward to.

fields.name: Ember Spirit
fields.description_short: Rapidly strikes and chains his foes
fields.description_long: Swift and elusive, Ember Spirit strikes all nearby enemies in rapid succession, and ties them up with burning chains. Quickly rushing across the battlefield to arrive at one of his exploding remnants, few can avoid, or capture, his flame.

fields.name: Enigma
fields.description_short: Traps and damages enemies in a black hole
fields.description_long: Widely feared for his ultimate ability, Enigma can summon a black hole capable of entrapping enemy forces, so that allies can then destroy them. An ever-present contingent of eidolons at his side, he pummels foes with ranged attacks.

fields.name: Enchantress
fields.description_short: Enchants neutral creeps to do her bidding
fields.description_long: Harmful up close and lethal at a distance, Enchantress skewers foes with attacks imbued to become more damaging the further they fly. Whether inflicting powerful slows on her enemies or charming forest creatures to fight her battles, she is never short of tools to win a fight.

fields.name: Grimstroke
fields.description_short: Disables enemies with a swipe of his brush
fields.description_long: Skilled at manipulating battle from the outskirts, Grimstroke studies every movement and assesses each line, deciding when to emerge from inky darkness to disable his victims and bind them together with a swipe of his brush. He delights in unleashing phantom thralls to vex opponents, as he carefully considers how to dispatch multiple enemies with one fateful stroke.

fields.name: Gyrocopter
fields.description_short: Barrages with his cannon and homing missiles
fields.description_long: With his arsenal of firepower at the ready, Gyrocopter soars into battle. Blasting all nearby enemies with shots from his cannon or hammering them with a barrage of rockets, if he is able to gather his full strength, he demolishes foes with ease.

fields.name: Faceless Void
fields.description_short: Can freeze his enemies in time
fields.description_long: Time is everything to Faceless Void. He speeds time to dash between locations, manipulates it to dodge attacks, stops it in a large area to devastate his foes, and given enough of it to gather resources, he can make himself unbelievably powerful.

fields.name: Invoker
fields.description_short: Weaves magic with an array of spell combos
fields.description_long: With an intricate arsenal of spells at his disposal, Invoker can adapt to any battle situation. Each configuration of his three spell components yields of one of ten spells, meaning he's never without a way to destroy or escape his enemies.

fields.name: Hoodwink
fields.description_short: Shackles her enemies to trees
fields.description_long: Always at hand when trouble's afoot, Hoodwink lives to tangle with the threats that fill the haunted forest she adopted as her home. Toting a massive crossbow while still able to scurry through the woodland with the greatest of ease, Hoodwink is nearly impossible to keep tabs on in battle. Lose track and she'll pop out behind you -- your stunned carcass already dangling in one of her nets.

fields.name: Huskar
fields.description_short: Sacrifices his health to deal more damage
fields.description_long: As his health lowers, Huskar's ability to slay enemies grows considerably. Able to instantly remove a portion of both his and an enemy's health with his ultimate, when near death he is able to throw his burning spears with devastating speed.

fields.name: Jakiro
fields.description_short: Freezes and burns enemies with magic
fields.description_long: Jakiro is their own best friend. Not content to merely punish enemies with fire, the twins freeze them in place to force them to stand there and burn. With foes aflame, they turn to inflicting massive damage on enemy structures with their liquid fire.

fields.name: Io
fields.description_short: Links to its allies to buff them
fields.description_long: Io has a talent for making allies more effective. A powerful companion, the wisp's tether speeds allies and stops enemies. Capable of linking to and teleporting across the battlefield with an ally, Io can make a dangerous ally even deadlier.

fields.name: Juggernaut
fields.description_short: Slices through his enemies with precise strikes
fields.description_long: In a flurry of slashes, Juggernaut cuts down his foes. Sprinting and spinning into battle with reckless abandon, and nearly invincible once he is able to begin his assault, stopping Juggernaut can often be just as difficult as surviving him.

fields.name: Keeper of the Light
fields.description_short: Provides instant mana to allies
fields.description_long: Keeper of the Light is a helpful addition to any team. Manipulating the mana of both his allies and enemies, he effortlessly destroys lesser foes with waves of illumination, then enters his spirit form to gather his team to press the assault.

fields.name: Legion Commander
fields.description_short: Increases power with each duel victory
fields.description_long: Marching across the battlefield, Legion Commander challenges lone enemies in single combat. Each duel she wins increases the power of her attacks, until at last she can become a relentless one-woman army.
fields.talent_left_25: Press the Attack grants 1.5s Debuff Immunity

fields.name: Kunkka
fields.description_short: Disrupts enemy positioning and disables them
fields.description_long: Kunkka is always predicting where his enemies will go next. Able to attack a location with a geyser of water or a ghostly shipwreck, should his aim prove true, he and his allies will have no trouble cleaning up whatever is left.
fields.talent_left_10: +25% X Marks the Spot Move Speed

fields.name: Lifestealer
fields.description_short: Infests other units for mobility and strength
fields.description_long: Should Lifestealer get close to his prey, there is little that can save them. Travelling within a creep or an allied hero, once he nears a foe he explodes from his host body, surprising enemies and tearing into them with his claws.

fields.name: Leshrac
fields.description_short: Can deal heavy damage in an aura around himself
fields.description_long: Leshrac's powerful spells lay waste to enemies and their defenses alike. Pushing deep into enemy territory with his devastating edict, careful timing of his ability to split the earth will stun foes, allowing his merciless allies to finish them off.
fields.talent_right_25: Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units

fields.name: Lich
fields.description_short: Unleashes a powerful attack that bounces between enemies
fields.description_long: Drifting from battle to battle and sacrificing creeps to fuel his assaults, Lich is always ready to help his fellow heroes destroy their enemies with slowing frost. Should his foes be foolish enough to gather, his bouncing ultimate will ensure their demise.

fields.name: Lion
fields.description_short: Steals enemy mana to fuel his own abilities
fields.description_long: Lion gives enemies little chance to retaliate. Stunning targets with a damaging row of spikes, or temporarily transforming them into a harmless critter, even if his powerful spells aren't enough, he and his allies should still have all the time they need to slay their foes.
fields.talent_left_15: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill
fields.talent_right_20: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

fields.name: Lina
fields.description_short: Increases attack and speed with every spell
fields.description_long: As deadly as she is fragile, Lina effortlessly strikes down any foe foolish enough to be caught alone. Gaining attack speed with each spell she casts, she scours enemies with flame and heat lightning, ensuring few can survive her assaults.

fields.name: Lone Druid
fields.description_short: Commands a powerful spirit bear in battle
fields.description_long: Battling alongside his powerful spirit bear, Lone Druid demolishes enemy forces and structures. Switching as needed between ranged and melee attacks with his transformation, should he have enough time to arm and strengthen both himself and his companion, there is little that can stop them.
fields.talent_left_25: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

fields.name: Luna
fields.description_short: Tears into her enemies with bouncing attacks
fields.description_long: Riding swiftly into battle, Luna tears into her enemies with attacks able to bounce between targets. When foes threaten, she calls down the power of the moon as a single searing beam or as a lunar barrage, crushing those who stand against her.
fields.talent_right_20: 2 Moon Glaives fired on Lucent Beam

fields.name: Lycan
fields.description_short: Shapeshifts into a ferocious beast
fields.description_long: As a man or as a wolf, Lycan devastates enemies with sharp claws and deadly jaws. Summoning stealthy wolves to scout ahead or assault a foe, his wolf transformation grants him the speed and strength to run down his enemies, or escape an ambush.

fields.name: Magnus
fields.description_short: Charges in to reposition his enemies
fields.description_long: Enemies who are foolish enough to gather learn to fear the horn of Magnus. Able to pull nearby foes together, he can batter them with empowered attacks or skewer them with his horn to bring them before his merciless allies.
fields.talent_right_15: +6 All Stats per hero hit with Reverse Polarity

fields.name: Medusa
fields.description_short: Immobilizes her enemies with her stone gaze
fields.description_long: Constant attack is the key to Medusa's success. Using her mana shield to stave off assault, she employs split shots to mow down waves of enemies. Once she gathers her full strength, she becomes a force powerful enough to stop anyone in their tracks.
fields.talent_right_10: +15% Mystic Snake Turn and Movement Speed Slow

fields.name: Marci
fields.description_short: Dashes around pummeling enemies with rapid attacks
fields.description_long: Proving that undying loyalty yields unrivaled power, Marci always marches into battle ready to raise fists in defense of her companions. Effortlessly flinging friends and foes around the battlefield, she happily bounds into any brawl, able to grant allies a deadly edge and unleash a hidden power strong enough to make even gods reconsider the wisdom of a hostile path.

fields.name: Mars
fields.description_short: Traps his foes in an inescapable arena
fields.description_long: The warrior deity Mars thrives in the heart of strife, guarded by the bulk of a deadly shield as he skewers enemies with his legendary spear. He revels in facing opponents in an arena ringed with loyal spearmenЧwho guarantee that no one escapes and that whatever odds he's facing, the god of war can dictate the terms of battle knowing the crowd is forever on his side.
fields.talent_left_25: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +180 HP Regen

fields.name: Monkey King
fields.description_short: Springs from the cover of the tree tops
fields.description_long: Always in search of a good fight, Monkey King travels atop the trees aiming to spring from leafy cover and surprise his enemies. Calling upon an army of monkey soldiers to overwhelm opponents, this agile trickster revels in the chaos of battle, ready to slam his legendary staff down on any hopes of escape.

fields.name: Meepo
fields.description_short: Five are stronger than one
fields.description_long: By summoning up to five permanent copies of himself, Meepo can fight from every front at once. Spreading his clones throughout the battlefield, when an enemy is found, he binds his foe, gathers his selves with an explosive teleport, then buries what remains.
fields.talent_left_15: Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

fields.name: Mirana
fields.description_short: Stuns enemies with precise arrows from afar
fields.description_long: As she takes aim from a distance with her deadly arrow, Mirana must always be ready to leap into battle. Able to shield her allies from the eyes of her enemies, she ensures that her team is always on the prowl.

fields.name: Muerta
fields.description_short: Blasts fearsome trickshots and unleashes ethereal ruin
fields.description_long: Muerta is a master of death who stalks the lands of life, corralling targets with fearsome trickshots and summoning revenants to smother her foes. Always ready to pick off unwary targets with her spare gunhand, Muerta is at her most menacing when she crosses the veil of the dead to strike her enemies with the ethereal fury of the damned.

fields.name: Naga Siren
fields.description_short: Able to capitivate and disable enemies with her song
fields.description_long: Sending squads of mirrored clones against her foes, Naga Siren ensnares and slays enemies as she leads her forces to victory. With the sound of her voice, she disables nearby foes to spring an ambush or crafting a hasty escape.

fields.name: Morphling
fields.description_short: Rides the waves to flank enemies
fields.description_long: Shifting his attributes to suit his situation, Morphling can be as elusive as he is deadly. Whether riding a wave to flank an enemy, or boosting his health before escaping into his deceptive replication, few can hope to corner him.

fields.name: Night Stalker
fields.description_short: Enpowered by the shadows of nightfall
fields.description_long: Once the sun goes down, Night Stalker's hunt begins. Charging through the shadowy forests, he snares prey in a slowing void as he tears them to shreds. Should sunrise threaten to end his terror, he can darken the skies to extend his onslaught.
fields.talent_left_15: +15% Hunter in the Night Status Resistance
fields.talent_right_25: +100 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

fields.name: Nature's Prophet
fields.description_short: Able to teleport to any location on the map at will
fields.description_long: Whether in the thick of battle or gathering resources for his next assault, Nature's Prophet seems to be everywhere. Teleporting at will to any location and instantly creating an army of violent trees to fight for him, he attacks where enemies least expect.

fields.name: Necrophos
fields.description_short: Damages enemies and heals allies simultaneously
fields.description_long: Wherever Necrophos goes, enemies wither as allies thrive. Restoring health to his friends and harming enemies with each death pulse, once his very presence has eaten away at an enemy, he summons the reaper to lengthen their stay in the afterlife.

fields.name: Omniknight
fields.description_short: Tanky frontliner who protects and heals his allies
fields.description_long: A guardian at the front lines of battle, Omniknight is always eager to join his team in battle. Whether healing an ally with a spell that also harms nearby foes, or battering an enemy with his mighty hammer, he protects his allies from harm.
fields.talent_right_20: +3 Heavenly Grace Strength/HP Regen per Debuff

fields.name: Nyx Assassin
fields.description_short: Reflects enemy damage and stuns
fields.description_long: Nyx Assassin is always hunting for fragile targets. Sneaking invisibly through the forest, when he spots his prey, he swipes them with his deadly claws and impales them on stunning spikes, then reverses any counterattack with his reflecting carapace.

fields.name: Ogre Magi
fields.description_short: Uses a touch of luck to amplify his skills
fields.description_long: With a chance to multiply the outcome of each spell they cast, a bit of luck is all Ogre Magi needs to burn enemies to cinder, or boost the power of his allies. Of course, luck can be difficult to rely upon...

fields.name: Pangolier
fields.description_short: Dashes and rolls in to disrupt enemy movements
fields.description_long: Eager to dash into danger at a moment's notice, the Pangolier thrives on disrupting enemy movements and placing himself in the midst of chaos. Artfully guiding his blade between cracks in armor and shrugging off attacks with his protective scales, this graceful swordsman is always ready to roll into battle.

fields.name: Oracle
fields.description_short: Alters the fates of heroes with his buffs and nukes
fields.description_long: By carefully combining his intricate abilities, Oracle controls the destinies of both friend and foe. Shrouding threatened allies with his false promise, he can grant an ally a few precious moments of protection to destroy an enemy, or even reverse a grisly fate.

fields.name: Outworld Destroyer
fields.description_short: Can imprison a hero, making them invulnerable
fields.description_long: Stealing from the minds of those he imprisons, Outworld Destroyer turns raw intelligence into destructive power. Weakening enemies with a barrage of arcane energy, he shatters their sanity with his ultimate blast, often erasing mana from those that survive.

fields.name: Phoenix
fields.description_short: Heals and damages at the sacrifice of its own health
fields.description_long: Diving into battle, Phoenix blasts enemies and heals allies with rays of solar flame. When the time is right, it can become a burning sun to scorch nearby foes before unleashing a stunning detonation that also restores Phoenix to full strength.

fields.name: Phantom Assassin
fields.description_short: Blinks onto her foes with critical strikes
fields.description_long: The moment she finds her prey, Phantom Assassin strikes. Instantly closing in on a target, she effortlessly dodges attacks as she relentlessly cuts away at her foe. Without warning, any one of her attacks could prove suddenly and brutally fatal.

fields.name: Phantom Lancer
fields.description_short: Creates illusions of himself to trick or attack foes
fields.description_long: Phantom Lancer storms enemy forces with an endless supply of clones. Leading his illusory army, he can cut foes apart in a breathtaking flurry of attacks, send clones to push into enemy territory, or use his doppelgangers to mislead and elude foes if cornered.

fields.name: Pudge
fields.description_short: Hooks and pulls enemies towards him
fields.description_long: Each carefully aimed throw of Pudge's signature hook strikes fear into his foes. Pulling his enemies near to carve them with his cleavers, he gains additional health and damage with every kill, and soon becomes an unstoppable killer.
fields.talent_left_25: 1.5x Flesh Heap Stack Str and Damage Block bonuses

fields.name: Primal Beast
fields.description_short: Stomps over everything and smashes enemies into messy bits
fields.description_long: Rushing savagely through enemies and allies alike, Primal Beast pounds into battle as one born to raise a ruckus. An unavoidable threat amidst any fray, the Beast can punish attackers and relishes grabbing prey to repeatedly slam them against the ground until nothing but mush remains.
fields.talent_left_15: Beast dispels himself when activating Uproar
fields.talent_right_25: Cannot be slowed or rooted during Trample

fields.name: Puck
fields.description_short: Orbs to enemies and silences them
fields.description_long: Puck has a talent for confounding its enemies with playfully elusive mischief. By teleporting to its damaging orb in order to hop short distances, it attacks foes with bursts of silencing dust. By the time its enemies can react, Puck has long since escaped.

fields.name: Pugna
fields.description_short: Drains enemy life to heal himself
fields.description_long: A crafty trickster, Pugna turns the enemy's power against itself as he blasts their defenses. While his nether ward strikes nearby foes that dare to cast a spell, he drains life from enemies to ensure he will be ready for the next assault.

fields.name: Razor
fields.description_short: Steals enemy damage to add to his own
fields.description_long: With a deadly lightning storm at his command, Razor charges into battle. Deploying a sweeping ring of electrified plasma to fry his enemies, he links with foes to drain them of their power and use it against them.
fields.talent_left_20: --0.1s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval
fields.talent_right_25: Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s

fields.name: Queen of Pain
fields.description_short: Blinks in to deal massive magical damage
fields.description_long: Queen of Pain strikes without warning, destroying gathered foes with deafening screams. Should an enemy survive her onslaught, she slows their escape with a throw of her dagger before finishing them off.

fields.name: Sand King
fields.description_short: Burrows to stun and slow enemies
fields.description_long: Not many can survive an ambush from Sand King. Demolishing everything around him with waves of deadly vibration from his ultimate, he evades counterattacks by hiding himself in a scouring gust of sand, and stuns foes by striking them from beneath.

fields.name: Riki
fields.description_short: Remains permanently invisible until the moment to strike
fields.description_long: Riki stalks the battlefield, unseen by the enemy. He chooses his moment carefully and bursts forth in a puff of silencing smoke, stabbing at his foes before they even know he's there.
fields.talent_right_15: +40% Tricks of the Trade Agility Increase
fields.talent_left_25: Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel

fields.name: Rubick
fields.description_short: Steals the spells of his enemies to use against them
fields.description_long: Always seeking a new spell to steal, Rubick is ever eager to turn an enemy's most unique advantage against them. Snatching his enemies into the air to fling them where he will, he has no trouble sowing chaos among careless foes.

fields.name: Shadow Shaman
fields.description_short: Summons powerful serpent wards to deal damage
fields.description_long: Shadow Shaman quickly clears the way for his team's forces to march on the enemy base. Blasting enemies with shocking spells and interrupting attackers with hexes, his powerful serpent wards destroy enemy defenses with ease.

fields.name: Shadow Demon
fields.description_short: Stacks exponential poison damage against his foes
fields.description_long: Spewing clouds of demonic poison to damage enemies or scout the battlefield, few dare to approach Shadow Demon. Banishing an enemy as his allies gather for the kill, he can inflict demonic curses as he summons traitorous illusions to turn enemy strength against itself.

fields.name: Shadow Fiend
fields.description_short: Unleashes the souls of fallen enemies for damage
fields.description_long: Capturing souls from every kill he makes, Shadow Fiend is always gathering his power. Every assault, each carefully aimed raze that kills an enemy, brings him closer to unleashing his gathered souls in a deadly blast of scouring energy.

fields.name: Slardar
fields.description_short: Chases down his enemies to weaken and bash them
fields.description_long: Ready to find and demolish his foes, Slardar quickly slithers into battle. After exposing an enemy's position and shattering their defenses, he closes the distance to lock them in place with crushing blows and powerful bashes from his trident.

fields.name: Silencer
fields.description_short: Can silence all enemies on the map
fields.description_long: Silencer changes the dynamic of every battle when he shuts down the enemy's ability to cast their spells. As he cuts his foes to ribbons with his glaive, he steals their intelligence to add to his own, ensuring his foes are always at a disadvantage.

fields.name: Skywrath Mage
fields.description_short: Casts high damage magical spells on a single target
fields.description_long: Deadly and fragile in equal measure, Skywrath Mage quickly destroys his enemies with a barrage of powerful magic. He silences foes while increasing their vulnerability to spells, meaning he has no trouble vaporizing any who stand against him.

fields.name: Sniper
fields.description_short: Picks off his enemies from afar
fields.description_long: Death from a distance is Sniper's specialty. He keeps his enemies on their toes with a steady barrage of firepower, and then, when the time is right, picks them off with a kill shot.

fields.name: Slark
fields.description_short: Slips in and out of skirmishes
fields.description_long: Pouncing into danger then slipping back out is what Slark does best. He rushes at the chance to pin or corner a lone foe, steals their essence with each cut from his dagger, and is always ready to vanish should the tables turn.
fields.talent_right_20: +1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

fields.name: Snapfire
fields.description_short: Mows down her enemies with heavy artillery and trusty lizard
fields.description_long: Just as happy to blow your legs off with her trusty scattergun as to fill your belly up with a deliciously-dangerous cookie, Beatrix Snapfire delights in riding into battle with her dragon toad Mortimer, always ready to mow down their enemies with her homemade heavy artillery or finish them off with a steady barrage of Mortimer's firespit globs.
fields.talent_right_20: Lil' Shredder Uses Your Attack Damage

fields.name: Storm Spirit
fields.description_short: Zips across the map to engage in fights
fields.description_long: Storm Spirit is never one to miss a fight. Zipping from across the battlefield in a bolt of lightning, he strikes enemies from every direction with exploding remnants and charged attacks, then disappears while his enemies are still scrambling to react.
fields.talent_left_25: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

fields.name: Spectre
fields.description_short: Haunts her enemies and teleports to her target
fields.description_long: Spectre haunts her enemies wherever they may be. Able to destroy lone prey with ease, she spreads her presence throughout the battlefield to choose her target. Once she has gathered her strength, none can escape her terrible wrath.

fields.name: Spirit Breaker
fields.description_short: Charges down enemies from anywhere on the map
fields.description_long: Highly mobile and always aggressive, Spirit Breaker charges across the map to bring the fight to his enemies. With each bash of his heavy lantern, he knocks his foes senseless. His enemies may run, but with the help of a few wards, they cannot hide.

fields.name: Templar Assassin
fields.description_short: Slows down enemies with traps
fields.description_long: Peppering the battlefield with slowing traps, Templar Assassin hides invisibly, ready to ambush her prey. Once she springs her attack, she shreds enemies with piercing psionic blades, and deflects counterattacks with her refracting shield.
fields.talent_left_15: +120 Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range
fields.talent_right_15: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled

fields.name: Sven
fields.description_short: Cleaves down enemies with his incredible strength
fields.description_long: Sven is always eager to charge into a fight. He stuns grouped enemies as he wades into battle, and once he ignites his damage-boosting ultimate, a few swings of his massive sword are often more than enough to slay his foes.

fields.name: Techies
fields.description_short: Surprises enemies with invisible landmines and explosive attacks
fields.description_long: For the Techies, battle is a matter of mischief. Giggling while they lob sticky bombs around the battlefield, their hidden explosive mines, disarming zaps, and reckless blast-off attacks are enough to leave most enemies dead. Or at least enraged. Often both.

fields.name: Timbersaw
fields.description_short: Chops through the forest to face his foes
fields.description_long: Elusive and unpredictable, Timbersaw chops through the forest to face his foes. Unleashing an arsenal of saw blades to cut enemies to pieces, he rides his chain into nearby trees and batters foes along the way.

fields.name: Terrorblade
fields.description_short: Transforms into a powerful ranged demon
fields.description_long: With Terrorblade, nothing is as it seems. Conjuring powerful illusions to confuse enemies and break their defenses, the demon marauder can exchange health with foes and friends to stave off death or weaken his enemies.

fields.name: Tidehunter
fields.description_short: Durable hero who shrugs off enemy damage
fields.description_long: Stalking ahead of his team, Tidehunter is always on the lookout for the right time to strike. When the moment comes, he unleashes his massive and devastating ultimate, paving the way for his allies to slay their stunned enemies.
fields.talent_left_25: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

fields.name: Treant Protector
fields.description_short: Calls upon the forest to root his foes
fields.description_long: Treant Protector is ever the benevolent ally, sprouting regenerating armor for his cohorts and their fortifications alike. Emerging unseen from among the trees, he binds foes with overgrowth as he leeches health from enemies and into nearby allies.

fields.name: Tinker
fields.description_short: Demolishes his enemies with swarms of machines
fields.description_long: Tinker demolishes foes with swarms of machines and a host of deadly gadgets. If he can gather the resources he needs, the power that instantly refreshes his abilities enables him to lead his team from every front.

fields.name: Tiny
fields.description_short: Grows in size and strength as battle ensues
fields.description_long: Growing to tremendous size and strength as the battle progresses, Tiny's power can quickly become terrifying. He tosses heroes and creeps at his enemies, or stuns them beneath an avalanche. Should he gather his full strength, he can demolish the enemy's base with ease.

fields.name: Underlord
fields.description_short: Teleports his team in and out of battle
fields.description_long: Conjure waves of abyssal flame to immolate enemies held paralyzed in your spiteful grip. Feast upon the carnage of battle, gaining strength as foes perish around you, their attacks diminished by your very presence. Tear a rift in reality to teleport yourself and your teammates across the map, delivering bloody retribution to any who would defy the will of Vrogros the Underlord.

fields.name: Troll Warlord
fields.description_short: Swaps between ranged and melee attacks at will
fields.description_long: Instantly able to swap between ranged and melee attacks, Troll Warlord is a formidable force at any distance. Axes in hand, he can strike in a storm of spinning blades. He takes down enemies with increasingly swift attacks, and can speed his allies' assaults wherever they are.

fields.name: Tusk
fields.description_short: Snowballs into his enemies to stun
fields.description_long: Tusk is always eager to start a fight. Able to instantly corner an enemy with a wall of ice shards, he gathers with his allies and rolls into enemies inside of a massive snowball, bringing him in range to land his signature knockout punch.

fields.name: Vengeful Spirit
fields.description_short: Can swap herself with any nearby hero
fields.description_long: Vengeful Spirit's presence is felt at all times, whether she is alive or dead. Able to swap positions with any nearby hero, stun enemies, and reduce her killer's effectiveness if she falls, she constantly brings confusion and chaos to her foes.

fields.name: Undying
fields.description_short: Summons hordes of zombies to attack his foes
fields.description_long: Shambling into battle, Undying forces enemies to decide whether to flee his wrath or be torn apart by it. He drains strength from his foes, and summons a horde of clawing undead. When he finally becomes a hulking flesh golem, his enemies may already be overwhelmed.

fields.name: Ursa
fields.description_short: Deals more damage with every hit to the same foe
fields.description_long: With each swipe of his claws, Ursa increases his target's vulnerability to his next attack. Capable of briefly increasing how swiftly he can strike, and able to slow down nearby prey, he quickly tears apart his enemies.
fields.talent_right_25: Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a 700 radius

fields.name: Visage
fields.description_short: Scouts and attacks with his familiars
fields.description_long: As his deadly familiars scout the field, Visage cloaks himself in armor and seeks the next battle. Once near a skirmish, he gathers soul energy from damage inflicted upon nearby fighters before releasing it in a devastating attack.
fields.talent_right_15: +1 Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars

fields.name: Venomancer
fields.description_short: Deals damage over time with venomous attacks
fields.description_long: Venomancer brings slow death to his enemies. Sprouting an endless army of toxin-spitting watchers to defend his territory, should foes draw near he can release a massive cloud of lingering poison to weaken enemies.
fields.talent_right_25: Noxious Plague Aura reduces 200 Attack Speed

fields.name: Viper
fields.description_short: Poisonous toxins chip away armor and slow enemies
fields.description_long: Launching deadly poison from a distance, Viper poses a grave threat to whomever he targets. As his various toxins eat away at an enemy's health and slow their movement, Viper simply does what he does best: he keeps adding more poison.

fields.name: Weaver
fields.description_short: Rewinds time to reverse damage and position
fields.description_long: Weaver has no trouble evading enemies to position himself for another strike. Slipping in and out of sight, he avoids death by rewinding himself to an earlier position and health state. His arsenal of elusive skills ensures he is always a critical nuisance to his foes.

fields.name: Void Spirit
fields.description_short: Steps in and out of the mortal plane to strike his foes
fields.description_long: Privy to secrets that would shatter a mortal mind, the Void Spirit emerges from his Hidden Temple to stand guard over multiple areas of the battlefield at once. Able to step into and out of the mortal plane at will, he easily outmaneuvers opponents to strike from wherever he desires, calling upon the powers of the aether to shield him in times of need.

fields.name: Warlock
fields.description_short: Summons powerful demons to fight at his side
fields.description_long: Summoning forth his demonic golem, Warlock brings ruin to enemies and destroys their defenses. Yet even without his golem, his dark spells can still wreak havoc, whether healing allies and harming enemies with a word, or binding foes together to share their agony.
fields.talent_right_15: +12 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies
fields.talent_left_25: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

fields.name: Witch Doctor
fields.description_short: Channels a high damage death ward
fields.description_long: Witch Doctor is whatever his team needs him to be. Whether aiding his team with gradual healing, stunning and cursing foes to ensure a kill, or destroying enemies himself with a dance by his mighty ultimate, few can match Witch Doctor's versatility.

fields.name: Windranger
fields.description_short: Fires swift flurry of arrows at a single target
fields.description_long: Evasive and swift, the nimble Windranger is always seeking the right angle to attack. Whether she's clearing the way with a draw of her deadly powershot, or shackling enemies together to pepper them with arrows, she's always on the move.
fields.talent_left_25: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 20s.

fields.name: Winter Wyvern
fields.description_short: Able to force her enemies to attack their own ally
fields.description_long: Winter Wyvern stalks the skies, slowing foes with burning cold as she soars over the battlefield. Should the enemy be foolish enough to gather, she curses them to attack one of their own as she blasts the gathering with icy splinters.

fields.name: Zeus
fields.description_short: Strikes enemies near and far with lightning
fields.description_long: None can hide from Zeus, whether he's calling down a bolt to reveal the surroundings, sending an arc coursing through his nearest enemies, or summoning a terrifying volley of lightning upon all enemies. Wherever his foes are, Zeus will find them.
fields.talent_right_20: +4% Arc Lightning Current Health As Damage

fields.name: Wraith King
fields.description_short: Can reincarnate instantly upon death
fields.description_long: Striding fearlessly toward his enemies, Wraith King stuns his foes and slashes them into submission. Should his enemies gain the upper hand, his self-resurrecting ultimate ensures he'll have another chance to swing his sword.

fields.name: Mist Coil
fields.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

fields.name: Aphotic Shield
fields.description:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating an all damage barrier that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the barrier is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Curse of Avernus
fields.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4.0 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.

fields.name: Borrowed Time
fields.description:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.0.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Curse of Avernus
fields.description: Causes Mist Coil to deal Abaddon's attack damage on impact. Increases Curse of Avernus base slow.

fields.name: Borrowed Time
fields.description: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525.0 damage while within 1200.0 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After 5.0 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

fields.name: Corrosive Weaponry
fields.description: Alchemist coats his weapons with an acid that applies a stacking slow and status resistance reduction to enemies hit.

fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.description:
Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Berserk Potion
fields.description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.description: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. Alchemist will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.

fields.name: Flux
fields.description:
Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, dealing damage over time. The damage is not applied if another enemy unit is near the target.

Arc Warden:

Slows the target's movement speed.

Tempest Double:

Movement speed slow is decreased, but damage is increased.

fields.name: Magnetic Field
fields.description:
Arc Warden:

Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that grants bonus attack speed and protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

Tempest Double:

Allies gain bonus attack range and deal bonus magic damage with their attacks. Duration is increased.

fields.name: Spark Wraith
fields.description:
Arc Warden:

Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.

Tempest Double:

Increased Wraith Speed and slow duration, decreased Activation Delay and Damage.

fields.name: Tempest Double
fields.description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and special Tempest Double versions of his spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.  The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed. The Tempest Double loses its sense of self if he is too far away from Arc Warden and deals less attack damage.

fields.name: Magnetic Field
fields.description: Magnetic Field pushes enemies out of the area when cast and slows them while they are in it. Also provides allies inside with magic resistance.

fields.name: Spark Wraith
fields.description: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 2.0 second activation period. The new Spark Wraiths last 15.0 seconds and has a radius of 225.0

fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

fields.name: Battle Hunger
fields.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.

fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

fields.name: Culling Blade
fields.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

fields.name: Counter Helix
fields.description: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown.

fields.name: Berserker's Call
fields.description: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown.

fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10.0 stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.

fields.name: Flamebreak
fields.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, slowing and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

fields.name: Firefly
fields.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider.

fields.name: Flaming Lasso
fields.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.description: Flaming Lasso no longer disarms you. Every other attack applies a stack of Sticky Napalm.

fields.name: Flaming Lasso
fields.description: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 650.0 units. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

fields.name: Mana Break
fields.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.

fields.name: Blink
fields.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

fields.name: Counterspell
fields.description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.

fields.name: Mana Void
fields.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

fields.name: Counterspell
fields.description: Counterspell passively grants an aura that reduces enemy spell damage. The reduction is stronger in close range.

fields.name: Blink Fragment
fields.description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

fields.name: Cold Feet
fields.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

fields.name: Ice Vortex
fields.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that deals damage, slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

fields.name: Chilling Touch
fields.description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.

fields.name: Ice Blast
fields.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

fields.name: Ice Blast
fields.description: Freezes enemies hit with the current level of Cold Feet for 0.0% of the duration.

fields.name: Chilling Touch
fields.description: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by %bonus_AbilityManaCost%%.

fields.name: Enfeeble
fields.description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.

fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

fields.name: Nightmare
fields.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.

fields.name: Fiend's Grip
fields.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

fields.name: Brain Sap
fields.description: Causes Brain Sap to become a 0.0 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 0.0%.

fields.name: Fiend's Grip
fields.description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take 0.0% incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and briefly slowing the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200.0 radius of each other.  Deals bonus damage to Tracked targets.

fields.name: Jinada
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.

fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.

fields.name: Track
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.description: Lowers cooldown and can be cast on allied heroes. Allied fade time is 1.0s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast on allies.

fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.description: Increases cast range and applies Jinada on hit.

fields.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
fields.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

fields.name: Quill Spray
fields.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14.0 seconds.

fields.name: Bristleback
fields.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 225.0 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

fields.name: Warpath
fields.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

fields.name: Hairball
fields.description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in with Viscous Nasal Goo and stacks of Quill Spray.

fields.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
fields.description: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases stack limit.

fields.name: Chaos Bolt
fields.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

fields.name: Reality Rift
fields.description: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6.0 seconds.

fields.name: Chaos Strike
fields.description: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength with bonus lifesteal. Deals 1.5x damage to creeps, but lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50.0%.

fields.name: Phantasm
fields.description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100.0% damage, but take 325.0% damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Chaos Bolt
fields.description: Increases  the cast range of Chaos Bolt, and causes it to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target.

fields.name: Phantasm
fields.description: Creates an illusion of allied heroes globally. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

fields.name: Hoof Stomp
fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

fields.name: Double Edge
fields.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

fields.name: Retaliate
fields.description: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage of your strength. Deals half damage to towers.

fields.name: Stampede
fields.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

fields.name: Double Edge
fields.description: Causes Double Edge to slow enemy heroes and increase Centaur's strength per hero hit for a short time. Duration refreshes per stack, up to a max of 0.0 stacks.

fields.name: Hitch A Ride
fields.description: Centaur tosses an ally into a cart hitched behind him. While in the cart, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede and the ally can still cast and attack normally, but cannot move independently or be targeted by opponents. Non-targeted effects can still affect the hitched ally. Increases the attack range of melee heroes by 200.0.

fields.name: Thunder Clap
fields.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.

fields.name: Cinder Brew
fields.description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3.0 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger.

fields.name: Drunken Brawler
fields.description:
Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls, gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies when Brewed Up.

Earth Brawler

- Grants 1.0 armor and 5.0% Magic Resistance. Bonuses are 3.0x when Brewed Up.

Storm Brawler

- Grants 15.0% evasion and 5.0% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are 3.0x when Brewed Up.

Fire Brawler

- Grants 24.0% chance to critical strike for 145.0% of your attack damage. Chance is 3.0x when Brewed Up.



Void Brawler

- Grants 5.0% bonus Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a 10.0% Slow for 2.0s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are 3.0x when affected by Cinder Brew.

fields.name: Primal Split
fields.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 4 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

fields.name: Primal Split
fields.description: Increases Primal Split duration and allows it to be cancelled early.

fields.name: Primal Companion
fields.description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves 1600.0 range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by 50.0%. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a 100.0% cooldown penalty.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3.0s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70.0 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.

fields.name: Bloodrage
fields.description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.

fields.name: Blood Rite
fields.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

fields.name: Thirst
fields.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80.0%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25.0%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.

fields.name: Rupture
fields.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.

fields.name: Bloodrage
fields.description: Bloodrage attacks now deal 1.8% of the targetТs max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

fields.name: Blood Mist
fields.description: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.

fields.name: Wild Axes
fields.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

fields.name: Call of the Wild Boar
fields.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.

fields.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
fields.description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.

fields.name: Inner Beast
fields.description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

fields.name: Primal Roar
fields.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40.0% movement speed for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
fields.description: Reduces Hawk cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s and Hawks gain Dive Bomb. If set to autocast, the Hawk will automatically dive bomb the first available target.

fields.name: Drums of Slom
fields.description:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.4s between hits after 20.0 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10/15/20 attacks, based on the current level of Primal Roar.

fields.name: Insatiable Hunger
fields.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

fields.name: Spin Web
fields.description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, increases her Turn Rate, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every 30.0 seconds, with a max of %AbilityCharges% charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP

fields.name: Silken Bola
fields.description: Deals impact damage, then slows the target and causes them to miss some attacks. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.

fields.name: Spawn Spiderlings
fields.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

fields.name: Insatiable Hunger
fields.description: Increases duration. While Hunger is active, the bonus damage is increased by 0.0% every 1.0s.

fields.name: Spinner's Snare
fields.description: Broodmother may create up to 5.0 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.

fields.name: Penitence
fields.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.

fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.description:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep and receives gold equal to its bounty. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.

Can be cast on converted creeps to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.

fields.name: Divine Favor
fields.description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and armor.

fields.name: Hand of God
fields.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 8.0 seconds afterwards.

fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.description: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God's level. Additionally levels up some abilities of creeps by 1 level.

fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.description: Grants persuaded creeps Martyrdom ability. Sacrifice the life of this unit to heal any ally with the current level of Hand of God.

fields.name: Strafe
fields.description:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Burning Skeleton Archers skeletons within a 1200.0 radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and 50.0% of the attack speed bonus.

Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.

fields.name: Tar Bomb
fields.description:
Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for 5.0 seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Burning Army Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

When the Tar Bomb hits, any Burning Army skeletons within attack range will attack the target.

fields.name: Death Pact
fields.description:
Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly skeleton and creates a Burning Skeleton Archer in their place, healing and gaining max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.

Archers are immobile and die within several attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range. Only one archer can be summoned from Death Pact at a time.

Skeletons deal 25.0% less damage to buildings

fields.name: Skeleton Walk
fields.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. Leaving Skeleton Walk creates Burning Skeleton Archers

fields.name: Burning Barrage
fields.description: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers, and dousing enemies with Tar Bomb slow.

fields.name: Burning Army
fields.description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.

fields.name: Crystal Nova
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

fields.name: Frostbite
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10.0 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200.0 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 3.0x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives 6.0x the bonus.

fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10.0 seconds.

fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 0.0% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by 0.0%.

fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.description: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over -1.0s.

fields.name: Vacuum
fields.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

fields.name: Ion Shell
fields.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

fields.name: Surge
fields.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of phased movement speed. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.

fields.name: Wall of Replica
fields.description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

fields.name: Surge
fields.description: Surged units leave behind a 0.0 radius trail that lasts 7.0s, slows enemies around it by -50.0% and deals 35.0 damage per second in 0.5s intervals. Can be put on autocast to disable the trail.

fields.name: Normal Punch
fields.description: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3.0 seconds. Max power is reached after 900.0 distance moved.

fields.name: Battery Assault
fields.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps.

fields.name: Power Cogs
fields.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Allies in the cogs when they are created receive a magic damage barrier. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

fields.name: Rocket Flare
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area. Upon impact, enemies in the area take damage and are briefly slowed. Rocket flare provides vision over the impact area for 6.0 seconds.

fields.name: Hookshot
fields.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a 175.0 radius around the hit target.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

fields.name: Jetpack
fields.description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.

fields.name: Overclocking
