fields.description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in it's range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

fields.name: Bramble Maze
fields.description: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after 0.3 seconds.  Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.

fields.name: Shadow Realm
fields.description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after 3.5 seconds.

fields.name: Cursed Crown
fields.description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

fields.name: Bedlam
fields.description: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.

fields.name: Terrorize
fields.description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.

fields.name: Cursed Crown
fields.description: Cursed Crown creates 4.0 brambles in a 175.0 radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces stun delay by 1.0 second.

fields.name: Shadow Realm
fields.description: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

fields.name: Starbreaker
fields.description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.

fields.name: Celestial Hammer
fields.description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for 2.0 seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.

fields.name: Luminosity
fields.description: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within 650.0 units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for 50.0% of the amount.

fields.name: Solar Guardian
fields.description: CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within 350.0 units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.

fields.name: Starbreaker
fields.description: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by 0.0% down to a minimum of 215.0.

fields.name: Solar Guardian
fields.description: Reduces the channel time and increases the healing and total duration of Solar Guardian's air time. Causes allies in the destination area to have evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne. Solar Guardian can be cast again after take off to land early. While airborne, the landing point of Solar Guardian can be moved at a speed of 200.0.

fields.name: Poison Touch
fields.description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.

fields.name: Shallow Grave
fields.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.

fields.name: Shadow Wave
fields.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

fields.name: Bad Juju
fields.description:
Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.

The spell can be activated by spending health to decrease the remaining cooldown of all other abilities and items. Casting Bad Juju temporarily increases its health cost.

fields.name: Poison Touch
fields.description: Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for 0.0 seconds.

fields.name: Shadow Wave
fields.description: Dazzle can now target enemies with Shadow Wave to create an Inverse Shadow Wave. The inverse wave bounces amonst enemies, dealing damage to them and healing any nearby allied units for 150.0% the healing and damage values of Shadow Wave. Dazzle will also perform an attack on any enemy hit by the Inverse Shadow Wave.

fields.name: Crypt Swarm
fields.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

fields.name: Silence
fields.description: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

fields.name: Spirit Siphon
fields.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

fields.name: Exorcism
fields.description:
Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 35.0 seconds.
Passively grants Movement Speed.

fields.name: Spirit Siphon
fields.description: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1.0 and causes enemies to be feared for 1.2 seconds if they are siphoned for 3.0 seconds consecutively.

fields.name: Exorcism
fields.description: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.

fields.name: Thunder Strike
fields.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by 100.0% for 0.1 seconds.  Provides vision of its target.

fields.name: Glimpse
fields.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions. Deals damage based on distance glimpsed, with max damage dealt at 1400.0 distance.

fields.name: Kinetic Field
fields.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

fields.name: Static Storm
fields.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

fields.name: Thunder Strike
fields.description: Increases the cast range and strike count of Thunder Strike. It can now also be ground targeted, where it will lie dormant for up to 5.0 seconds and attach to the first enemy that comes within the radius.

fields.name: Static Storm
fields.description: Mutes items.

fields.name: Devour
fields.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed and gaining armor temporarily while it digests the creep. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.

fields.name: Scorched Earth
fields.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.

fields.name: Infernal Blade
fields.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.5 seconds and applies a 4.0 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

fields.name: Doom
fields.description:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Infernal Blade
fields.description: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for a longer duration and take bonus damage.

fields.name: Doom
fields.description: Allies in a 0.0 radius around the doomed target also suffer the effects of Doom. Allows Doom to be self-cast to affect enemies around himself.

fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.description:
Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

While in Dragon Form, applies the corresponding debuff from Corrosive Breath and Frost Breath when in those forms.

fields.name: Dragon Tail
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.0.

fields.name: Dragon Blood
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.

LEVEL 1 Green Dragon

- Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20.0 poison damage per second for 5.0 seconds. Works on structures.

LEVEL 2 Red Dragon

- Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350.0 radius for 75.0% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon

- Frost Breath: slows movement speed by -40.0% and attack speed by -40.0 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3.0 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

fields.name: Fireball
fields.description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.description: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, 25% increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.

fields.name: Fissure
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75.0 bonus attack range on the next attack.

fields.name: Aftershock
fields.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

fields.name: Echo Slam
fields.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

fields.name: Fissure
fields.description: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.

fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.description: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.

fields.name: Boulder Smash
fields.description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a 200.0 radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units. Deals 1.3x damage to creeps.

fields.name: Rolling Boulder
fields.description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.5s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing 30.0 + 100.0% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.

fields.name: Geomagnetic Grip
fields.description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.

fields.name: Stone Remnant
fields.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. Gains additional charges every 5.0 hero levels.

fields.name: Magnetize
fields.description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

fields.name: Geomagnetic Grip
fields.description: Can now grab allies.

fields.name: Enchant Remnant
fields.description:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>

Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.

Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.

fields.name: Frost Arrows
fields.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.

fields.name: Gust
fields.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.

fields.name: Multishot
fields.description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.8 seconds.

fields.name: Marksmanship
fields.description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility, with allies receiving 50.0% of the bonus Drow receives. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400.0 range.

fields.name: Glacier
fields.description: Drow Ranger creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow Ranger additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through.

fields.name: Frost Arrows
fields.description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.

fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

fields.name: Sleight of Fist
fields.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes.

fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that creates a magic damage barrier, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the barrier is broken, the damage is also lost.

fields.name: Activate Fire Remnant
fields.description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.

fields.name: Fire Remnant
fields.description: Sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250.0% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant.  Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.

fields.name: Fire Remnant
fields.description: Fire Remnants deal damage per second in an area around them. If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

fields.name: Fire Remnant
fields.description: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.

fields.name: Impetus
fields.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.

fields.name: Enchant
fields.description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Nature's Attendants
fields.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 9.0 seconds.

fields.name: Untouchable
fields.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

fields.name: Little Friends
fields.description: All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack Enchantress' chosen target for 6.0 seconds.

fields.name: Sproink
fields.description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3.0 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.0.

fields.name: Echo Stomp
fields.description: CHANNELED - Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

fields.name: Astral Spirit
fields.description:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through. When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.

The Astral Spirit can be controlled and possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

fields.name: Natural Order
fields.description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.

fields.name: Earth Splitter
fields.description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.

fields.name: Echo Stomp
fields.description: Lowers Cooldown. Echo Stomp may be placed on autocast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

fields.name: Astral Spirit
fields.description: Causes Elder Titan to become debuff immune and gain 50% magic resistance for 2.0 seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.

fields.name: Malefice
fields.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2.0 seconds.

fields.name: Demonic Conversion
fields.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

fields.name: Midnight Pulse
fields.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their current HP.

fields.name: Black Hole
fields.description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

fields.name: Malefice
fields.description: Increases Malefice stun duration by 0.35s and creates an Eidolon next to the target every instance of Malefice stun. These Eidolons will not multiply further.

fields.name: Black Hole
fields.description: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to 3.5% of the unit's Max Health per second and does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200.0 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.0.

fields.name: Time Walk
fields.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2.0 seconds.

fields.name: Time Dilation
fields.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8.0 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10.0% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown. The debuff does not tick down while inside Chronosphere.

fields.name: Time Lock
fields.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.

fields.name: Chronosphere
fields.description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  All ability and item cooldowns are frozen. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.

fields.name: Reverse Time Walk
fields.description: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

fields.name: Time Walk
fields.description: Applies a Time Lock to all units at the landing destination.

fields.name: Stroke of Fate
fields.description: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.

fields.name: Phantom's Embrace
fields.description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.

fields.name: Ink Swell
fields.description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3.0 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.

fields.name: Soulbind
fields.description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.

fields.name: Ink Swell
fields.description:
Causes Ink Swell to deal 40.0% more damage and heal the target for 40.0% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Dark Portrait
fields.description: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is debuff immune, has 95% magic resistance, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.

fields.name: Acorn Shot
fields.description:
Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit. The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.

If point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets. The ability may be placed on auto-cast to force this behavior.

fields.name: Bushwhack
fields.description: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemies if they are near a tree in the area.  Affected enemies take damage over time and are pulled towards the tree nearest to them within the target area, and have their vision reduced to 0 for the duration of the stun.

fields.name: Scurry
fields.description: Hoodwink passively has a chance to evade physical attacks while near trees.  When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, phased collision, and tree-walking for a brief time.

fields.name: Sharpshooter
fields.description:
Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage, break and slow to an enemy Hero. The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after 3.0 seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after 5.0 seconds.

Hoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of 350.0 from the force of the shot.

fields.name: Hunter's Boomerang
fields.description: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage.

fields.name: Decoy
fields.description: Hoodwink turns invisible, increasing her movement speed, and creates a decoy illusion that starts aiming a decreased damage Sharpshooter at the nearest enemy hero. If the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and it throws a lesser bushwhack towards the enemy.

fields.name: Rocket Barrage
fields.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3.0 seconds.

fields.name: Homing Missile
fields.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

fields.name: Flak Cannon
fields.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 12.0 seconds or until the attacks are used.

fields.name: Call Down
fields.description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. After 2.0 seconds, two missiles arrive in succession, with 2.0 seconds between them.

fields.name: Homing Missile
fields.description: Homing Missiles now constantly fires the current level of Rocket Barrage in a 700.0 area of effect after 1.0 second of being cast. This Rocket Barrage prioritizes the Homing Missile target.

fields.name: Flak Cannon
fields.description: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.

fields.name: Inner Fire
fields.description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.

fields.name: Burning Spear
fields.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.

fields.name: Berserker's Blood
fields.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.

fields.name: Life Break
fields.description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them. While leaping, Huskar is Debuff Immune and has 50% increases magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Inner Fire
fields.description: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies.

fields.name: Life Break
fields.description: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.

fields.name: Dual Breath
fields.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

fields.name: Ice Path
fields.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

fields.name: Liquid Fire
fields.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

fields.name: Macropyre
fields.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

fields.name: Liquid Frost
fields.description: Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack. Enemies hit are slowed for 4.0 seconds and are damaged for a percent of their max health plus a base amount every 1.0 second for 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Macropyre
fields.description: Increases Macropyre distance by +400.0 range, duration by +15.0 seconds and causes it to become Pure damage that pierces debuff immunity.

fields.name: Quas
fields.description:
Allows manipulation of ice elements. Passively grants +2 Strength per level. Each

Quas

instance provides increased health regeneration.

fields.name: Wex
fields.description:
Allows manipulation of storm elements. Passively grants +2 Agility per level. Each

Wex

instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

fields.name: Exort
fields.description:
Allows manipulation of fire elements. Passively grants +2 Intelligence per level. Each

Exort

instance provides increased attack damage.

fields.name: Invoke
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by 0.3 seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

fields.name: Cold Snap
fields.description:
Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of

Quas

. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of

Quas

.

fields.name: Ghost Walk
fields.description:
Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of

Quas

, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of

Wex

.

fields.name: Tornado
fields.description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of

Wex

. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of

Quas

. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in

Wex

.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: E.M.P.
fields.description:
Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of

Wex

. Deals damage for each point of mana drained. If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.

fields.name: Alacrity
fields.description:
Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of

Wex

and their damage based on the level of

Exort

.

fields.name: Chaos Meteor
fields.description:
Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of

Exort

, and rolling further based on the level of

Wex

. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of

Exort

.

fields.name: Sun Strike
fields.description:
Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of

Exort

, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

fields.name: Forge Spirit
fields.description:
Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage and armor are based on the level of

Exort

while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of

Quas

. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. Spawns two spirits when Quas and Exort are at least level 4.

fields.name: Ice Wall
fields.description:
Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of

Quas

. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of

Quas

and deals damage each second based on the level of

Exort

.

fields.name: Deafening Blast
fields.description:
Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of

Exort

. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of

Quas

, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of

Wex

.

fields.name: E.M.P.
fields.description: Increases damage for each point of mana drained by EMP and pulls enemy units into the EMP's center at 100.0 units per second.

fields.name: Sun Strike
fields.description: Creates a Cataclysm when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 100.0 second cooldown. Creates 0.0 visible Sun Strikes within 160.0-200.0 range of each enemy hero. Additionally Increases the level of Quas, Wex and Exort by 1.

fields.name: Tether
fields.description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether. Tether briefly slows enemies touching it.

fields.name: Spirits
fields.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

fields.name: Overcharge
fields.description: Io gains bonus attack speed, spell amplification, and HP Regen based on max health.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.

fields.name: Spirits In
fields.description: Sends the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

fields.name: Spirits Out
fields.description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

fields.name: Relocate
fields.description: Teleports Io and a tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires, Io and the tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

fields.name: Overcharge
fields.description: Increases Overcharge Spell Amplification, and Io gains Spell Lifesteal and can now share Spell Lifesteal with its tethered target.

fields.name: Spirits
fields.description: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second up to the max. Spirits colliding with enemy Heroes slows them briefly. Can be activated to explode spirits.

fields.name: Illuminate
fields.description: CHANNELED - Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

fields.name: Blinding Light
fields.description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss some attacks. Knockback is 400.0 range over 0.6 seconds.

fields.name: Chakra Magic
fields.description: Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount.

fields.name: Solar Bind
fields.description: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.

fields.name: Spirit Form
fields.description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining bonus movement speed, cast range, grants the Blinding Light ability, and allows Illuminate to be channeled by a separate spirit and heal allies.

fields.name: Illuminate
fields.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

fields.name: Recall
fields.description: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

fields.name: Will-O-Wisp
fields.description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.

fields.name: Torrent
fields.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

fields.name: X Marks the Spot
fields.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

fields.name: Ghostship
fields.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

fields.name: Tidal Wave
fields.description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

fields.name: Torrent Storm
fields.description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every 0.3 for 5.0 seconds. Spawns within 1100.0 range of him.

fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 325.0 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25.0 seconds.

fields.name: Blade Dance
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

fields.name: Omnislash
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.description: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury, and attacks random nearby enemy units with reduced damage.

fields.name: Swiftslash
fields.description: Performs a short Omnislash for 1.0 seconds.

fields.name: Frost Blast
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4.0 seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.

fields.name: Frost Shield
fields.description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1.0 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.

fields.name: Sinister Gaze
fields.description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana. If cast on a creep lasts 2.0x longer and deals 250.0 damage per second.

fields.name: Chain Frost
fields.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10.0 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.

fields.name: Ice Spire
fields.description:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 5 hero hits or 10 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.

fields.name: Sinister Gaze
fields.description: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of 0.0 in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.

fields.name: Overwhelming Odds
fields.description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage per unit or per hero and granting you bonus attack speed . Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health. Can be cast during Duel.

fields.name: Press The Attack
fields.description:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus movement speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Moment of Courage
fields.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

fields.name: Duel
fields.description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.

fields.name: Overwhelming Odds
fields.description: Overwhelming Odds now grants armor for every unit hit and has increased duration.

fields.name: Duel
fields.description: Increases Duel duration and reduces cooldown.  Legion Commander and her opponent take reduced damage from other sources.

fields.name: Split Earth
fields.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

fields.name: Diabolic Edict
fields.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts 10.0 seconds.

fields.name: Lightning Storm
fields.description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.

fields.name: Pulse Nova
fields.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.

fields.name: Split Earth
fields.description: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location 3.0 additional times, with a 5.0 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 60.0. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

fields.name: Nihilism
fields.description: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.

fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

fields.name: Hex
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.

fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.description: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to 2.0 additional enemies and gets +400.0 additional break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with 50% magic resistance while channeling.

fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

fields.name: Rage
fields.description:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Debuff Immune, increasing magic resistance by 80%, and gaining increased movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Feast
fields.description: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.

fields.name: Ghoul Frenzy
fields.description: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.

fields.name: Infest
fields.description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Open Wounds
fields.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving 500.0 damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within 700.0 radius.

fields.name: Infest
fields.description: Increases cast range and reduces cooldown to %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s.  Infest may target enemy heroes for a short duration, disarming them and attacking them from the inside while increasing Lifestealer's regeneration rate.

fields.name: Dragon Slave
fields.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

fields.name: Light Strike Array
fields.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

fields.name: Fiery Soul
fields.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18.0 seconds.

fields.name: Laguna Blade
fields.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

fields.name: Fiery Soul
fields.description: Lina's abilities deal %shard_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

fields.name: Flame Cloak
fields.description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.

fields.name: Summon Wolves
fields.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple that gives 20% chance to cripple the target, causing 8 damage per second and lose 60 attack speed for 4 seconds.

fields.name: Howl
fields.description: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage of all enemies within 2000.0 range of Lycan and his wolves. Non-hero controlled units flee for a short time. At night Howl's armor and attack damage reductions are global.

fields.name: Feral Impulse
fields.description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40.0% chance to deal a critical strike doing 160.0% damage.

fields.name: Summon Wolves
fields.description: Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave. Additionally, wolves spawned this way may Cripple towers.

fields.name: Wolf Bite
fields.description: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain 30.0% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within 1200.0 range of each other.

fields.name: Summon Spirit Bear
fields.description:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack. Lone Druid suffers 20.0% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

Spirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Claws abilities.

fields.name: Spirit Link
fields.description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.

fields.name: Savage Roar
fields.description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20.0%.

fields.name: True Form
fields.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased bonus armor and health, and improved versions of Entangling Claws and Demolish.

fields.name: Savage Roar
fields.description:
Applies a basic dispel and grants allies in an area around the caster bonus movement and attack speed. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Summon Spirit Bear
fields.description: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

fields.name: Lucent Beam
fields.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

fields.name: Moon Glaives
fields.description: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

fields.name: Lunar Blessing
fields.description: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes, with Luna receiving 200.0% of the attack damage bonus allies receive. At night Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with increased vision range.

fields.name: Eclipse
fields.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.

fields.name: Lucent Beam
fields.description: Every time an enemy hero is hit by a Lucent Beam, Luna's attack damage is increased by 0.0 for 0.0s.

fields.name: Eclipse
fields.description: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams, reduces duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

fields.name: Spear of Mars
fields.description: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.

fields.name: God's Rebuke
fields.description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.

fields.name: Bulwark
fields.description:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs 70.0% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.

fields.name: Arena Of Blood
fields.description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.

fields.name: Spear of Mars
fields.description: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.

fields.name: Bulwark
fields.description: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage and slow enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

fields.name: Shockwave
fields.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them towards him and slowing them for a brief period.

fields.name: Empower
fields.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Magnus receives 75.0% larger bonus.

fields.name: Skewer
fields.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and affected by slowed movement and attack speed.

fields.name: Reverse Polarity
fields.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

fields.name: Shockwave
fields.description: Increases range, and causes Shockwave to return towards the caster's original cast location after reaching max length, hitting enemies a second time for 0.0% of the damage.

fields.name: Horn Toss
fields.description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend 0.6 seconds in the air, and then are stunned upon landing.

fields.name: Dispose
fields.description: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.

fields.name: Rebound
fields.description:
Marci bounds to the targeted allied unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies where she lands.

The ally receives 25.0% bonus movement speed for 5.0s.

fields.name: Sidekick
fields.description: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with lifesteal and attack damage.

fields.name: Unleash
fields.description:
Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes that slow movement and attack speed of the target for 2.0s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for 1.5s.

Marci gains 15.0% movement speed when Unleash is cast.

fields.name: Rebound
fields.description: Rebound can be cast on enemies and causes Marci to also get the speed boost when she casts it.

fields.name: Unleash
fields.description:
Reduces Unleash cooldown by 20.0 seconds and causes Unleash to apply a basic dispel on Marci. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast. All of Marci's unleash pulses will silence units for 0.0 seconds.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Starstorm
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650.0 radius will be struck a second time for 75.0% of the damage.

fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.0 to 3.2 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180.0 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

fields.name: Leap
fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

fields.name: Leap
fields.description:
Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

Can be put on autocast to choose the distance and facing direction of the jump.

Grants 1.0 bonus charge(s).

fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.

fields.name: Split Shot
fields.description:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike).

fields.name: Mystic Snake
fields.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. Damage and speed increases with each jump. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake returns 16.0% mana based on the targets' total mana.

fields.name: Mana Shield
fields.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 98.0% of incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana. Provides bonus mana capacity.

fields.name: Stone Gaze
fields.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2.0 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical attack damage.

fields.name: Cold Blooded
fields.description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.

fields.name: Mystic Snake
fields.description: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.

fields.name: Earthbind
fields.description: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.

fields.name: Poof
fields.description:
Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations.

If the ability is in autocast state, all Meepos will also cast Poof to the target. When cast on the ground, all Meepos except the selected one will Poof to the closest location.

fields.name: Ransack
fields.description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.

fields.name: Divided We Stand
fields.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.

fields.name: Dig
fields.description:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for 3.0s. Restores 35.0% of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: MegaMeepo
fields.description:
Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a 600.0 radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains 50.0% of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.

fields.name: Dead Shot
fields.description:
Muerta fires a ghostly trickshot at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes, it damages and briefly slows, then ricochets in the targeted direction.

The ricochet damages all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet are feared away from the impact.

fields.name: The Calling
fields.description: Summons a group of 4.0 revenants that slowly circle the targeted location. Enemies within the area are slowed and have reduced attack speed. Revenants deal damage and silence enemies as they pass through them.

fields.name: Gunslinger
fields.description: Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire a second shot at another target, prioritizing Heroes.

fields.name: Pierce the Veil
fields.description:
Muerta transforms, becoming immune to physical damage. All of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage. Muerta gains bonus attack damage and phased movement.

Muerta can attack ethereal units, but deals no damage to Magic Immune targets.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Pierce the Veil
fields.description:
Muerta gains 30.0% Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.

While Pierce the Veil is active Muerta permanently gains 2.0% spell amplification each time she kills an enemy Hero or they die in her vicinity.

fields.name: Parting Shot
fields.description:
Muerta precisely shoots a hero in their soul, separating it from their physical body and knocking it 150.0 units away.

The soul is untargetable, muted, disarmed, and invulnerable for 4.0 seconds.

The body is stunned and has 50.0% damage reduction for this duration.

After the effect ends the hero's soul is forcefully returned to their body applying a strong dispel. The soul will survive until the end of the effect even if the hero is killed.

fields.name: Boundless Strike
fields.description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.

fields.name: Tree Dance
fields.description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.

fields.name: Jingu Mastery
fields.description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.

fields.name: Wukong's Command
fields.description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

fields.name: Boundless Strike
fields.description: When Boundless Strike is set to autocast, Monkey King leaps to the end of his staff as soon as Boundless Strike hits the ground.

fields.name: Wukong's Command
fields.description: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.

fields.name: Waveform
fields.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

fields.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
fields.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. Passively grants bonus Agility.

Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3.0 second cooldown.

fields.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
fields.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. Passively grants bonus Strength.

Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3.0 second cooldown.

fields.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
fields.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

fields.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
fields.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

fields.name: Morph
fields.description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.

fields.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
fields.description: Increases bonus Agility.

fields.name: Morph
fields.description: Morphling steals stats from the replicated hero. If the replicated hero's primary attribute is Strength it will also steal Status Resistance, if it's Agility, it will steal Attack Speed, if it's Intelligence, it will steal Spell Amplification, and if it's Universal, it will steal additional stats.

fields.name: Death Pulse
fields.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

fields.name: Ghost Shroud
fields.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

fields.name: Heartstopper Aura
fields.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for 8.0 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

fields.name: Reaper's Scythe
fields.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

fields.name: Death Seeker
fields.description: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.

fields.name: Ghost Shroud
fields.description: Reduces Ghost Shroud cooldown.

fields.name: Mirror Image
fields.description:
Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Ensnare
fields.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

fields.name: Rip Tide
fields.description: Every 6.0 attacks from naga and her illusions, the Naga Siren and her images will hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Song of the Siren
fields.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

fields.name: Song of the Siren
fields.description: Increases duration. Song of the Siren heals allies by 0.0% of their Max HP per second for its duration.

fields.name: Reel In
fields.description: CHANNELED - Naga Siren channels for up to %AbilityChannelTime% seconds, pulling all units affected by Naga's Ensnare in a 1400.0 range towards her at a speed of 200.0.

fields.name: Sprout
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place and providing vision in a 250.0 radius.

fields.name: Teleportation
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map. After teleporting, Nature's Prophet gains stacks of bonus attack damage. Every attack consumes a stack of bonus damage to increase Nature Prophet's armor.

fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.

fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

fields.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth
fields.description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 1200.0 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250.0 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.

fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.description: Lowers cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 2.0s up to 3.8s seconds at max bounce.

fields.name: Fireblast
fields.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

fields.name: Ignite
fields.description: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

fields.name: Bloodlust
fields.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.

fields.name: Multicast
fields.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.

fields.name: Dumb Luck
fields.description: Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength. Increases Multicast chance by 1% for each 20 Strength Ogre has.

fields.name: Fire Shield
fields.description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3.0 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.

fields.name: Unrefined Fireblast
fields.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 35.0% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

fields.name: Void
fields.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and the slowing effect lasts longer.

fields.name: Crippling Fear
fields.description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.

fields.name: Hunter in the Night
fields.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

fields.name: Dark Ascension
fields.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.

fields.name: Hunter in the Night
fields.description: Hunter in the Night may be cast on a creep, instantly killing it and restoring some of Night Stalker's maximum health and mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime.

fields.name: Void
fields.description: Void becomes an area of effect ability. Increases the mini-stun duration and leaves behind a void zone. While in the zone, all of Night Stalker's abilities are empowered with their night time effect.

fields.name: Impale
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units take damage, then are hurled into the air and stunned.

fields.name: Mind Flare
fields.description: Deals damages to the enemy equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence. Additionally deals damage equal to a percentage of damage the target received from Nyx in the past 15.0s.

fields.name: Spiked Carapace
fields.description:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

fields.name: Vendetta
fields.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, 50.0% of the target's max mana is removed and massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

fields.name: Vendetta
fields.description: Vendetta now moves faster, and a successful Vendetta attack now increases the target's spell damage taken.

fields.name: Burrow
fields.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

fields.name: Arcane Orb
fields.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.

fields.name: Astral Imprisonment
fields.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.

fields.name: Essence Flux
fields.description: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.

fields.name: Sanity's Eclipse
fields.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals damage to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment. Deals bonus damage to illusions.

fields.name: Astral Imprisonment
fields.description: Grants additional Mana Capacity steal to Astral Imprisonment. Also allows allies to move at 0.0% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).

fields.name: Essence Flux
fields.description: Damage that brings Outworld Destroyer below 20.0% health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to 50.0% of his maximum mana that lasts for 15.0 seconds. This effect can occur every 60.0 seconds and cannot be refreshed.

fields.name: Purification
fields.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

fields.name: Heavenly Grace
fields.description: Applies a strong dispel on himself and the target ally and grants both of them bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs dispelled.

fields.name: Hammer of Purity
fields.description: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.

fields.name: Guardian Angel
fields.description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.

fields.name: Hammer of Purity
fields.description: Omniknight is healed for %bonus_heal_pct%% of the damage dealt by Hammer of Purity. Every %bonus_attack_cooldown% seconds, his next attack will fire a Hammer of Purity at the target.

fields.name: Guardian Angel
fields.description: Increases duration, provides Status Resist, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

fields.name: Fortune's End
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and dispels enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only dispel debuffs. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Fate's Edict
fields.description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them if they are an enemy and granting them 100.0% magic damage resistance if they are an ally.

fields.name: Purifying Flames
fields.description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.

fields.name: False Promise
fields.description:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is amplified. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Rain of Destiny
fields.description: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced heal amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming heal amplification.

fields.name: False Promise
fields.description: Causes False Promise to have a 0.1 second fade delay invisibility and grants the ally 25.0% bonus Spell Damage and 0.3 reduced Base Attack Time.

fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

fields.name: Doppelganger
fields.description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1.0 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500.0% bonus damage and deals -80.0% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Phantom Rush
fields.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

fields.name: Juxtapose
fields.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8.0 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Juxtapose
fields.description: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to 8.0 seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by 15.0% during this invisibility.

fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.description: Spirit Lance bounces twice on enemies, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage and slow amount.

fields.name: Swashbuckle
fields.description:
Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.

Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.

fields.name: Shield Crash
fields.description:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging and slowing all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

fields.name: Lucky Shot
