fields.description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to apply a Disarm and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.

fields.name: Rolling Thunder
fields.description:
Pangolier curls into a debuff immune ball with 50% additional magic resistance and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land.

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Roll Up
fields.description: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way.

fields.name: Shield Crash
fields.description: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero.

fields.name: Stifling Dagger
fields.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65.0+25.0% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

fields.name: Phantom Strike
fields.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed and lifesteal while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

fields.name: Blur
fields.description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes, towers, or outposts.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

fields.name: Coup de Grace
fields.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

fields.name: Fan of Knives
fields.description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

fields.name: Blur
fields.description: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Any time Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces cooldown and increases Vanish Buffer.

fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

fields.name: Waning Rift
fields.description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

fields.name: Dream Coil
fields.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.description: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + 200.0 every time it phase shifts.

fields.name: Dream Coil
fields.description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked every 0.0 seconds.

fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

fields.name: Fire Spirits
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

fields.name: Sun Ray
fields.description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.

fields.name: Supernova
fields.description:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6.0 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Sun Ray
fields.description: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova, and slows affected enemies by 12.0%.

fields.name: Supernova
fields.description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

fields.name: Onslaught
fields.description:
Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him.

Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.

fields.name: Trample
fields.description: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every 140.0 units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.

fields.name: Uproar
fields.description:
The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of 50.0 damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar.

When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for 7.0 seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.

fields.name: Pulverize
fields.description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Lasts 2.3 seconds.

fields.name: Rock Throw
fields.description: Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the throck splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

fields.name: Uproar
fields.description: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases 3.0 waves of 2.0 projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

fields.name: Shadow Strike
fields.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15.0 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3.0 seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.

fields.name: Blink
fields.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

fields.name: Sonic Wave
fields.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

fields.name: Blink
fields.description: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 125.0 damage in a 300.0 AoE and silences the target for 1.8 seconds.

fields.name: Shadow Strike
fields.description: Causes Shadow Strike to become a 0.0 AoE Spell, and have increased initial damage. When Shadow Strike ends or is re-applied to an enemy Hero, the target emits a Scream of Pain, hitting any nearby enemies.

fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.

fields.name: Rot
fields.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

fields.name: Flesh Heap
fields.description: Gives Pudge damage block against all sources. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

fields.name: Dismember
fields.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75.0 units, up to a minimum of 125.0 range. Lasts longer on creeps.

fields.name: Dismember
fields.description: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.

fields.name: Rot
fields.description: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.

fields.name: Nether Blast
fields.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

fields.name: Decrepify
fields.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead. Can be cast while channeling.

fields.name: Nether Ward
fields.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.

fields.name: Life Drain
fields.description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

fields.name: Nether Ward
fields.description: Increases cast range.

fields.name: Life Drain
fields.description: Reduces cooldown by 7.0s. When targeting an enemy hero, Pugna reduces their outgoing spell damage by 0.0% per second up to a maximum of 0.0% and increases his own, up to a maximum of 0.0%. When draining through a Nether Ward using Shard, the rate of increase/decrease is 0.0% instead. Debuff lasts 0.0 seconds.

fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

fields.name: Fade Bolt
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

fields.name: Arcane Supremacy
fields.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.

fields.name: Spell Steal
fields.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.

fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.description: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 85.0% longer and throw delay is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

fields.name: Spell Steal
fields.description: Increases the number of spells that can be stolen to 2. Increases cast range, and upgrades spells to their Scepter version.

fields.name: Plasma Field
fields.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.

fields.name: Static Link
fields.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.

fields.name: Storm Surge
fields.description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed.

fields.name: Eye of the Storm
fields.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

fields.name: Storm Surge
fields.description: Causes Storm Surge to have a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

fields.name: Eye of the Storm
fields.description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

fields.name: Smoke Screen
fields.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.

fields.name: Blink Strike
fields.description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

fields.name: Tricks of the Trade
fields.description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.

fields.name: Cloak and Dagger
fields.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. Bonus damage is doubled against non-hero units. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus experience for hero kills and assists.

fields.name: Smoke Screen
fields.description: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by 0.0 and cannot be targeted by their allies.

fields.name: Tricks of the Trade
fields.description: Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.  Each attack hits an additional target.

fields.name: Shadowraze
fields.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.

fields.name: Necromastery
fields.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.

fields.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
fields.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies. Every enemy hero killed nearby further improves armor reduction by 2.0 for 20.0s.

fields.name: Requiem of Souls
fields.description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.7 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.1. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

fields.name: Necromastery
fields.description: Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.

fields.name: Necromastery
fields.description: Increases max souls.

fields.name: Burrowstrike
fields.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit.

fields.name: Sand Storm
fields.description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.

fields.name: Caustic Finale
fields.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.

fields.name: Epicenter
fields.description: After a cast point of 2.0 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

fields.name: Epicenter
fields.description: Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every 700.0 units moved causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

fields.name: Sand Storm
fields.description: Every 0.2s, 0.0 Burrowstrike spines are created at random locations, each having a 0.0 radius, that apply Burrowstrike damage and stun to enemies hit.

fields.name: Disruption
fields.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

fields.name: Disseminate
fields.description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within 675.0 range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

fields.name: Shadow Poison
fields.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5.0 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50.0 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

fields.name: Demonic Purge
fields.description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Demonic Cleanse
fields.description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration. At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Demonic Cleanse
fields.description: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 2.0 charges that replenish every 60.0 seconds.

fields.name: Arcane Bolt
fields.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence. Upon impact, leaves a debuff that increases Skywrath Mage's spell lifesteal against the target.

fields.name: Concussive Shot
fields.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect. Deals 75.0% damage to creeps.

fields.name: Ancient Seal
fields.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

fields.name: Mystic Flare
fields.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.0 seconds.

fields.name: Shield of the Scion
fields.description: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a buff that grants bonus Intelligence and Armor. Each charge stacks independently.

fields.name: Arcane Bolt
fields.description: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, a different random target within 700.0 range willl be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

fields.name: Ether Shock
fields.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

fields.name: Hex
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

fields.name: Shackles
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.

fields.name: Mass Serpent Ward
fields.description: Summons 10.0 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

fields.name: Shackles
fields.description: Shackles creates 4.0 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 75.0. Serpent wards lasts 7.0 seconds.

fields.name: Mass Serpent Ward
fields.description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage.

fields.name: Arcane Curse
fields.description: Curses the target area, dealing damage and causing enemy heroes to take damage over time and slowing their movement speed. Silenced enemies take 1.5x slow and damage. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased. The duration is paused as long as the target is silenced.

fields.name: Glaives of Wisdom
fields.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit. If Silencer kills an enemy hero, he permanently steals 2.0 Intelligence.

fields.name: Last Word
fields.description: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.

fields.name: Global Silence
fields.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

fields.name: Glaives of Wisdom
fields.description: Every 0.0 attacks, Glaives silence the enemy hit for 0.0 seconds. Additionally, it increases the Intelligence stolen per attack by 2 and per kill to 2.0.

fields.name: Last Word
fields.description: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.

fields.name: Scatterblast
fields.description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra 50.0% damage.

fields.name: Firesnap Cookie
fields.description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.

fields.name: Lil' Shredder
fields.description: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire 6.0 fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.

fields.name: Mortimer Kisses
fields.description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over 5.5 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600.0. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.

fields.name: Firesnap Cookie
fields.description: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, getting increased jump range and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does 50.0% impact damage to the landing destination.

fields.name: Gobble Up
fields.description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to 3.0 seconds.

fields.name: Guardian Sprint
fields.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.

fields.name: Slithereen Crush
fields.description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

fields.name: Bash of the Deep
fields.description: After 3.0 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.

fields.name: Corrosive Haze
fields.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.

fields.name: Slithereen Crush
fields.description: Increases Slithereen Crush radius, and causes it to apply Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.

fields.name: Guardian Sprint
fields.description: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.description:
After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 30.0% of the damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Pounce
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, leashing the first hero he connects with and applying Essence Shift Stacks.  That unit can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

fields.name: Essence Shift
fields.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1.0 Agility.

fields.name: Shadow Dance
fields.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

fields.name: Depth Shroud
fields.description: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.

fields.name: Pounce
fields.description: Provides charges and increases range.

fields.name: Charge of Darkness
fields.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

fields.name: Bulldoze
fields.description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

fields.name: Greater Bash
fields.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage. Deals 1.5x damage to creeps.

fields.name: Nether Strike
fields.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

fields.name: Planar Pocket
fields.description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting the first targeted enemy hero spell in a radius towards him. Effect ends when the first spell is redirected.

fields.name: Charge of Darkness
fields.description: Reduces Charge of Darkness cooldown and makes it pierce magic immunity.

fields.name: Shrapnel
fields.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35.0 seconds.

fields.name: Headshot
fields.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100.0%.

fields.name: Take Aim
fields.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide 100.0% Headshot chance. Slows you by 45.0% for the duration.

fields.name: Assassinate
fields.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.

fields.name: Concussive Grenade
fields.description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

fields.name: Assassinate
fields.description: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and stun the enemy target.

fields.name: Spectral Dagger
fields.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain. Spectral Dagger applies an instance of Desolate to targets with no allied units within 400 radius of them.

fields.name: Desolate
fields.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 400.0 radius around them.

fields.name: Dispersion
fields.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

fields.name: Haunt
fields.description:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They ignore terrain.

fields.name: Dispersion
fields.description: Dispersion can be activated to increase damage reflected by 0.0% for 0.0s. Cooldown 0.0. Manacost 0.0.

fields.name: Shadow Step
fields.description: Allows Spectre to perform a single target Haunt on a visible enemy. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.

fields.name: Sticky Bomb
fields.description: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for 3.0 seconds.

fields.name: Reactive Tazer
fields.description: Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed and get a Basic Dispel. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.

fields.name: Blast Off!
fields.description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and stun enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies non-lethal damage equal to a percentage of their current health.

fields.name: Minefield Sign
fields.description: Plant a warning sign, causing mines within it's radius to be invulnerable. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 60.0 seconds.

fields.name: Proximity Mines
fields.description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active 500.0 AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for 1.0 seconds dealing damage and temporarily reducing the enemy's Magic Resistance. The explosion deals full damage if the target is within 150.0 radius and decreases up to 50.0% on the edge. Deals 30.0% damage to buildings.

fields.name: Reactive Tazer
fields.description: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

fields.name: Minefield Sign
fields.description: Increases radius and duration of Minefield Sign. When an enemy hero walks within 200.0 units of a minefield sign, the 500.0 units area around the sign will become a minefield for 10.0 seconds, dealing damage to enemy units any time they move within its area. Minefield Sign is destroyed after this effect ends.

fields.name: Static Remnant
fields.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12.0 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

fields.name: Electric Vortex
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.

fields.name: Overload
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

fields.name: Ball Lightning
fields.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25.0+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10.0+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

fields.name: Overload
fields.description: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes 3.0 Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12.0 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

fields.name: Electric Vortex
fields.description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

fields.name: Storm Hammer
fields.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

fields.name: Great Cleave
fields.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack. Passively grants bonus Strength.

fields.name: Warcry
fields.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 10.0 seconds.

fields.name: God's Strength
fields.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 35.0 seconds.

fields.name: Warcry
fields.description: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants armor to all allies near Sven.

fields.name: Storm Hammer
fields.description: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the Storm Hammer. Storm Hammer also applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If autocast on the ability is enabled, Sven does not travel with the Storm Hammer.

fields.name: Gush
fields.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.

fields.name: Kraken Shell
fields.description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Anchor Smash
fields.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

fields.name: Ravage
fields.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

fields.name: Tendrils of the Deep
fields.description: Tidehunter unleashes a targeted slew of tentacles that damage and stun enemies within reach. The tentacles deal 50.0% of Ravage's damage and stun, with a range 75.0% of Ravage's radius.

fields.name: Gush
fields.description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

fields.name: Refraction
fields.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

fields.name: Meld
fields.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 12.0 seconds.

fields.name: Psi Blades
fields.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.

fields.name: Psionic Trap
fields.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30.0% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60.0% after 3.5 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

fields.name: Psionic Trap
fields.description: Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.

fields.name: Psionic Projection
fields.description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 1.5 seconds, detonating it upon arrival. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.

fields.name: Reflection
fields.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes have movement and attack speeds slowed and attacked by their reflection.

fields.name: Conjure Image
fields.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

fields.name: Metamorphosis
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 1200.0 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.

fields.name: Sunder
fields.description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

fields.name: Demon Zeal
fields.description:
Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, dispelling Terrorblade and providing bonus movement and attack speed. The bonuses are stronger out of Metamorphosis.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Terror Wave
fields.description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.

fields.name: Avalanche
fields.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2.0x damage to units being tossed.

fields.name: Toss
fields.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300.0 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.

fields.name: Tree Grab
fields.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

fields.name: Grow
fields.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.

fields.name: Tree Throw
fields.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

fields.name: Tree Grab
fields.description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

fields.name: Tree Volley
fields.description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

fields.name: Whirling Death
fields.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.

fields.name: Timber Chain
fields.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

fields.name: Reactive Armor
fields.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor. Heroes grant double the amount.

fields.name: Second Chakram
fields.description: Launches a second independent Chakram.

fields.name: Chakram
fields.description: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5.0% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

fields.name: Flamethrower
fields.description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.

fields.name: Reactive Armor
fields.description: Reactive Armor can now be activated to get max stacks and 200.0 damage barrier. Grants Timbersaw 100.0 + 75.0 barrier amount per second for each enemy hero within 600.0 radius of Timbersaw up to a maximum of 800.0. After 8.0 seconds, Timbersaw deals damage to every hero within 600.0 radius equal to 200.0 + his remaining barrier amount and loses all of his barrier.

fields.name: Laser
fields.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.

fields.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
fields.description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within 2000.0 range.

fields.name: Defense Matrix
fields.description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.

fields.name: Keen Conveyance
fields.description: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.

fields.name: Rearm
fields.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

fields.name: Warp Flare
fields.description: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 3.0 seconds.

fields.name: Laser
fields.description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +200.0 cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 10.0% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700.0 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

fields.name: Ice Shards
fields.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Snowball
fields.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350.0 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

fields.name: Tag Team
fields.description: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 5.0 seconds.

fields.name: Frozen Sigil
fields.description: Summons a flying Sigil that slows movement speed by -40% for enemies within 650 radius. Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30

fields.name: Walrus PUNCH!
fields.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.

fields.name: Ice Shards
fields.description: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.

fields.name: Walrus Kick
fields.description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250.0 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50.0% if kicking a creep.

fields.name: Nature's Grasp
fields.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.

fields.name: Leech Seed
fields.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.

fields.name: Living Armor
fields.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.

fields.name: Nature's Guise
fields.description: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for 3.0 seconds. While active, Treant gains bonus movement speed.

fields.name: Overgrowth
fields.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

fields.name: Nature's Guise
fields.description: Causes Treant to move faster and become invisible with Nature's Guise and root enemies upon attacking. Deals damage over time and roots for longer if the attack was near a tree.

fields.name: Eyes In The Forest
fields.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.

fields.name: Berserker's Rage
fields.description:
While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.

Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

fields.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
fields.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950.0 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

fields.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
fields.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

fields.name: Fervor
fields.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

fields.name: Battle Trance
fields.description:
Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900.0 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Rampage
fields.description: Grants all allied Heroes globally a bonus based on whichever stance Troll Warlord is currently in. Ranged provides bonus Attack Speed and melee provides Status Resistance.

fields.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
fields.description:
Causes Whirling Axes (Ranged) to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

fields.name: Earthshock
fields.description: Ursa leaps forward 250.0 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Overpower
fields.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

fields.name: Fury Swipes
fields.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 8.0 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

fields.name: Enrage
fields.description:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Earthshock
fields.description: Earthshock applies a 1.5 second Enrage on Ursa when cast.

fields.name: Enrage
fields.description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

fields.name: Firestorm
fields.description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

fields.name: Pit of Malice
fields.description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every 3.6 seconds.

fields.name: Atrophy Aura
fields.description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.

fields.name: Fiend's Gate
fields.description: Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for 3 seconds to teleport to the other side. Allies that pass through the portal temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Portals have to be at least 2000.0 away from each other.

fields.name: Firestorm
fields.description: Firestorm can be self-targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows Underlord around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

fields.name: Pit of Malice
fields.description: Slows enemy movement speed in the Pit of Malice.

fields.name: Decay
fields.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals 2.0x damage to creeps.

fields.name: Soul Rip
fields.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

fields.name: Tombstone
fields.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

fields.name: Flesh Golem
fields.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.

fields.name: Tombstone
fields.description: Allows up to 1 allied hero to bunker inside of the tombstone. Heroes that enter the Tombstone cannot leave for 3.0 seconds nor can they re-enter after leaving for the same period of time. Adds an ability on the Tombstone and Undying to manually bunker heroes.

fields.name: Decay
fields.description: Increases strength steal.

fields.name: Poison Attack
fields.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5.0 times.

fields.name: Nethertoxin
fields.description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.

fields.name: Corrosive Skin
fields.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400.0 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

fields.name: Viper Strike
fields.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

fields.name: Poison Attack
fields.description: Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.

fields.name: Nosedive
fields.description: Viper slams into the ground, disarming each enemy in a 500.0 AoE for 4.0 seconds and splattering everyone in a 1200.0 AoE with the effect of Corrosive Skin.

fields.name: Magic Missile
fields.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

fields.name: Wave of Terror
fields.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

fields.name: Vengeance Aura
fields.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.

fields.name: Nether Swap
fields.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Allied swapped units receive less damage for a short duration.

fields.name: Magic Missile
fields.description: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.

fields.name: Vengeance Aura
fields.description: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has 12.0% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.

fields.name: Venomous Gale
fields.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

fields.name: Poison Sting
fields.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.

fields.name: Plague Ward
fields.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

fields.name: Noxious Plague
fields.description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.

fields.name: Latent Toxicity
fields.description: Applies a weak poison that minorly slows and deals damage to its target. If this poison is dispelled in any way, the target will receive a large amount of damage and be stunned.

fields.name: Poison Nova
fields.description: Whenever Venomancer dies or the effects of Venomous Gale end prematurely on an enemy hero, a spreading ring of poison erupts. Enemies hit by the poison will take non-lethal magic damage over time and have their magic resistance reduced. This effect can trigger every 10.0 seconds and cannot be refreshed.

fields.name: Fatal Bonds
fields.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

fields.name: Shadow Word
fields.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

fields.name: Upheaval
fields.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to 10.0 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3.0 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

fields.name: Chaotic Offering
fields.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives 60.0 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

fields.name: Upheaval
fields.description: While channeling, Warlock spawns an imp every 2.0 seconds that lasts for 15.0 seconds and explode dealing damage to all enemies around them upon death.

fields.name: Chaotic Offering
fields.description: Calls 2.0 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

fields.name: Grave Chill
fields.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.

fields.name: Soul Assumption
fields.description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 100.0 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

fields.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
fields.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

fields.name: Summon Familiars
fields.description: Conjures blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

fields.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
fields.description: Grants Visage the ability to cast Gravekeeper's Cloak. Restores up to 25.0% of your health.

fields.name: Silent as the Grave
fields.description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 35.0 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.

fields.name: Aether Remnant
fields.description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.

fields.name: Dissimilate
fields.description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.

fields.name: Resonant Pulse
fields.description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a physical damage barrier and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The barrier gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.

fields.name: Astral Step
fields.description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.3 seconds and then detonates.

fields.name: Aether Remnant
fields.description: Increases Aether Remnant watch range and only pulls enemy hero units. Other units are still damaged, but the remnant is not destroyed. Decreases cooldown to %AbilityCooldown%s.

fields.name: Resonant Pulse
fields.description: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain 2.0 charges.

fields.name: Arctic Burn
fields.description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 4.0% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400.0 additional vision range at night while soaring.

fields.name: Splinter Blast
fields.description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500.0 base radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30.0%.

fields.name: Cold Embrace
fields.description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

fields.name: Winter's Curse
fields.description: Winter Wyvern dispells then freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.

fields.name: Cold Embrace
fields.description: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200.0 range. Reduces cooldown by 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Arctic Burn
fields.description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

fields.name: The Swarm
fields.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12.0 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

fields.name: Geminate Attack
fields.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

fields.name: Time Lapse
fields.description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.description: Shukuchi puts a mark on enemies it damages that last 0.0 seconds. When Geminate Attack procs, enemies with a mark within 0.0 range will also be attacked with a secondary attack

fields.name: Time Lapse
fields.description: Time Lapse may target allied Heroes with 500.0 cast range.

fields.name: Shackleshot
fields.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.

fields.name: Powershot
fields.description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1.0 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.

fields.name: Windrun
fields.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

fields.name: Focus Fire
fields.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 350.0 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.

fields.name: Gale Force
fields.description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.

fields.name: Windrun
fields.description: Windrun's enemy debuff has increased slow, reduces physical damage taken by 0.0%, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.

fields.name: Arc Lightning
fields.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.

fields.name: Lightning Bolt
fields.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750.0 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325.0 range.

fields.name: Heavenly Jump
fields.description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Thundergod's Wrath
fields.description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

fields.name: Lightning Hands
fields.description: Zeus's gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of it's damage.

fields.name: Nimbus
fields.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

fields.name: Paralyzing Cask
fields.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 200.0% damage to creeps.

fields.name: Voodoo Restoration
fields.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units and damaging enemies for 100.0% of the heal value, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.

fields.name: Maledict
fields.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

fields.name: Death Ward
fields.description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8.0 seconds. Death Ward has 50.0% bonus accuracy.

fields.name: Voodoo Switcheroo
fields.description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

fields.name: Death Ward
fields.description: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

fields.name: Wraithfire Blast
fields.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target. Summoned skeletons around the target will receive bonus movement and attack speed for the duration of the debuff.

fields.name: Vampiric Spirit
fields.description:
Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.

Skeletons deal less damage to buildings.

fields.name: Mortal Strike
fields.description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.

fields.name: Reincarnation
fields.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900.0 radius will be slowed, and spawn 1.0 skeleton(s) to attack each nearby enemy hero. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.

fields.name: Reincarnation
fields.description: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and increases Skeleton Spawn count.

fields.name: Reincarnation
fields.description: Reduces cooldown by 40.0s. If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed and gain bonus attack and movement speed. Heroes who die this way respawn at a faster rate.
